Package uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.application

Class InputProcessor

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.application.InputProcessor
public class InputProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
Instances of this class are used by the App class to process the given inputs, whether they are provided directly by the user, or fetched from the file server. Note: It is assigned a WebServerFileFetcher instance to retrieve any files from the web server - it then extracts the relevant information from them, turning it into appropriate objects.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private WebServerFileFetcher fileFetcher

  • Field Details

    • fileFetcher

      private final WebServerFileFetcher fileFetcher

  • Constructor Details

    • InputProcessor

      public InputProcessor​(int port)
      The constructor of the InputProcessor class.
      Parameters:
      port - the port needed to initialise the fileFetcher attribute that is responsible for the connection to the relevant file server

  • Method Details

    • getSensorsForDate

      java.util.ArrayList<Sensor> getSensorsForDate​(int day, int month, int year)
      This method generates the list of sensors to be visited on a given day. It does so with the help of the WebServerFileFetcher class, asking it to fetch the sensor information from the web server before processing it.
      Parameters:
      day - the day of month of the drone's tour
      month - the month of the drone's tour
      year - the year of the drone's tour
      Returns:
      a list of stubs that represent the relevant sensors

    • processW3wString

      private What3WordsLocation processW3wString​(java.lang.String w3wString)
      This method turns the name of a What3Words Location into a proper instance of the corresponding class, so that it can be used as attribute of a Sensor object. It does so by asking the WebServerFileFetcher to return the relevant JSON String from the server.
      Parameters:
      w3wString - the name of the relevant What3Words Location
      Returns:
      an instance of the What3WordsLocation class

    • processW3wStub

      What3WordsLocation processW3wStub​(JsonWhat3WordsStub stub)
      This method turns a JSON stub representing a What 3 Words Location into a proper instance of the according class.
      Parameters:
      stub - a JSON stub representing a What 3 Words Location
      Returns:
      the What3WordsLocation instance that was initially represented by the stub

    • loadNoFlyZonesFromServer

      java.util.ArrayList<TwoDimensionalMapObject> loadNoFlyZonesFromServer()
      This method generates a list of No-Fly-Zones that the drone needs to take care of. It does so by asking the WebServerFileFetcher to load the relevant JSON file, before turning it into a Mapbox FeatureCollection and then a list of NoFlyZone objects with the relevant properties.
      Returns:
      a list of all no fly zones declared on the file server
